glosses: Shows pain, anger or an unexpected event.: fuck!

examples.translation: Oh fuck! The house is on fire!

glosses: Shows anger or annoyance directed towards a specific person.: fuck off!

examples.text: Hazretlerinizden nazikçe siktirmelerini rica etmek zorunda kalacağım.
examples.translation: I will have to kindly ask of your excellency to go fuck themselves.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish سیكدیر (sikdir). Second-person singular imperative of siktirmek (“to let fuck”) which is causative of sikmek (“to fuck”) derived from sik (“penis”). The word literally means "let (yourself) get fucked". Compare to Azerbaijani sikdir.
